By Eagle Fierce on Monday, April 16, 2001 - 07:01 pm:

*chuckles* I actually remember when Wildcard and Zoniks were still around. I remember arguing morals with Tiamat when he'd joke aroudn about how to get a Moo. I just hope that this board can continue its' long reign of prosperity and enlightenment that has made it so popular. Likewise, I hope that the newcomers will continue to be friendly and see this as a second home.

A TOAST to a year of peace and a lifetime of dreams! ^_^
